about.title: About the Project: Outfit Checker
about.description: "Outfit Checker" is a web-based application that allows users to check their outfits before leaving the house. The goal of the project is to create an intelligent solution that helps users choose the right outfit based on current weather data. An outfit analyzer is used to take a photo of the user and analyze the outfit, providing recommendations.
about.projectDescription: This project is part of the MoCIoT (Mobile Computing and IoT) submission and demonstrates the use of modern web technologies, machine learning, and API integration to develop a useful application tailored to users' everyday needs. The application uses the user's webcam to capture an image and weather data to generate personalized recommendations.

member.name: Daniel Kosin
member.description: Daniel Kosin is the founder and main developer of this project.

technologies.title: Technologies and Tools
technologies.description: The following technologies and tools were used in the development of this project:

list.htmlCssJs: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript: Basic web technologies for the structure, design, and interactivity of the application.
list.bootstrap: Bootstrap: A framework for responsive design and mobile optimization.
list.jquery: jQuery: A JavaScript library that simplifies DOM manipulation and event handling.
list.i18next: i18next: A library for implementing multilingual support.
list.webrtc: WebRTC: An API to integrate the user's webcam for capturing images.
list.openWeatherMap: OpenWeatherMap API: For integrating real-time weather data for outfit recommendations.
list.machineLearning: Machine Learning: For analyzing outfit photos and generating recommendations.

list.liveCapture: Live image capture using the user's webcam.
list.outfitAnalysis: Automatic outfit analysis based on a photo of the user.
list.weatherIntegration: Integration of real-time weather data for personalized outfit recommendations.
list.multilingualSupport: Multilingual support for a global user base.

future.title: Future Perspectives
future.description: In the future, the project could be expanded by adding more features, such as integrating clothing brands to provide users with tailored outfit suggestions or a cloud-based analysis platform for more accurate outfit evaluation.
